thread.title: Robert Healy

author: Robert Healy
title: Robert Healy
text: Great service, I booked the next day fitting slot which was on a Sunday no problem at all. Booking online was quick and easy and having the option to pay through paypal was great. I got all confirmation emails really quickly. I received a further email on the morning of the fitting giving an estimated time that the technician would arrive. I then got a phonecall from the technician to say he was on his way. When he arrived he was very polite and professional. Had 2 tyres fitted in no time. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
